text: Tamen yi an la fashi tamen mei shuo shenme [huaihua], qishi, tamen yi shuoguo bu xinyang dehua, tamen xinyang yisilan jiao hou you bu xinyangle, bing tumou tamen suo buneng shixian de [mousha mu sheng]. Tamen feinan, zhi yin an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] yi an la de enhui shi tamen fuyu. Jiaru tamen huiguo zi xin, na dui tamen shi zui hao de; jiaru tamen weikang, name, an la bi zai jinshi he houshi yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi tamen, tamen zai da dishang jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
